title: Deep elf mage
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

*For a list of all deep elves, see [list of deep elves](/List_of_deep_elves "List of deep elves").*

|   | A deep elf learned in the ways of murderous magic. It is capable of casting a wide array of harmful spells. |

## Useful Info

**Deep elf mages** are flimsy but unpredictable [deep elf](/List_of_deep_elves "List of deep elves") casters, capable of hitting you with a wide variety of spells, though at reassuringly low [spell power](/Spell_power "Spell power"). While never harmless, they pale in comparison to some of the deadlier deep elf varieties. They can be found roaming the later floors of [the Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon") on their own, and often appear in packs with other deep elves in the [Elven Halls](/Elven_Halls "Elven Halls"), [the Vaults](/The_Vaults "The Vaults") and some [baileys](/Bailey "Bailey").

| Spell set I |                                                          |                                                     |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Bolt of Cold](/Bolt_of_Cold "Bolt of Cold") (3d17)      | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Throw Icicle](/Throw_Icicle "Throw Icicle") (3d17)      | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Summon Ice Beast](/Summon_Ice_Beast "Summon Ice Beast") | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4       | [Blink](/Blink "Blink")                                  | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

| Spell set II |                                                                 |                                                     |
| :----------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1        | [Bolt of Draining](/Bolt_of_Draining "Bolt of Draining") (3d17) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2        | [Summon Demon](/Summon_Demon "Summon Demon")                    | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3        | [Summon Vermin](/Summon_Vermin "Summon Vermin")                 | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4        | [Blink](/Blink "Blink")                                         | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

| Spell set III |                                                                            |                                                     |
| :------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1         | [Bolt of Fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire") (3d17)                        | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2         | [Sticky Flame Range](/Sticky_Flame_Range "Sticky Flame Range") (3d5)       | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3         | [Summon Fire Elementals](/Summon_Fire_Elementals "Summon Fire Elementals") | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4         | [Blink](/Blink "Blink")                                                    | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

| Spell set IV |                                                                               |                                                     |
| :----------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1        | [Bolt of Magma](/Bolt_of_Magma "Bolt of Magma") (3d17)                        | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2        | [Stone Arrow](/Stone_Arrow "Stone Arrow") (3d15)                              | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3        | [Summon Earth Elementals](/Summon_Earth_Elementals "Summon Earth Elementals") | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4        | [Blink](/Blink "Blink")                                                       | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

| Spell set V |                                                           |                                                     |
| :---------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Lightning Bolt](/Lightning_Bolt "Lightning Bolt") (3d16) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Blink](/Blink "Blink")                                   | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

| Spell set VI |                                                                                       |                                                     |
| :----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1        | [Magic Dart](/Magic_Dart "Magic Dart") (3d5)                                          | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2        | [Force Lance](/Force_Lance "Force Lance") (3d13)                                      | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3        | [Iskenderun's Battlesphere](/Iskenderun%27s_Battlesphere "Iskenderun's Battlesphere") | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

Although far from harmless, prioritize taking out the other deep elves before attacking these.

## History

- Deep elf magi were split into [deep elf pyromancers](/Deep_elf_pyromancer "Deep elf pyromancer") and [deep elf zephyrmancers](/Deep_elf_zephyrmancer "Deep elf zephyrmancer") in [0.27](/0.27 "0.27").
- Prior to [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), the Conjuration-focused spell set had [Iskenderun's Mystic Blast](/Iskenderun%27s_Mystic_Blast "Iskenderun's Mystic Blast") instead of [Force Lance](/Force_Lance "Force Lance").
- In [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), Deep elf mages became stronger and gained new spell sets, including spells previously cast by [deep elf conjurers](/Deep_elf_conjurer "Deep elf conjurer") and [summoners](/Deep_elf_summoner "Deep elf summoner").
- Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), deep elf mages had spell sets identical to a [wizard's](/Wizard_\(monster\) "Wizard (monster)"), including such devastating spells as [Banishment](/Banishment "Banishment") and [Lehudib's Crystal Spear](/Lehudib%27s_Crystal_Spear "Lehudib's Crystal Spear").

Deep elf mage

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

For a list of all deep elves, see list of deep elves.

deep elf mage e 
HP 26-54
HD 9
XP 570
Speed 10
AC 1
EV 12
Will 40
Attack1 5 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type elf, elf
Flags Speaks
Warm-blooded
A deep elf learned in the ways of murderous magic. It is capable of casting a wide array of harmful spells.

Useful Info

Deep elf mages are flimsy but unpredictable deep elf casters, capable of hitting you with a wide variety of spells, though at reassuringly low spell power. While never harmless, they pale in comparison to some of the deadlier deep elf varieties. They can be found roaming the later floors of the Dungeon on their own, and often appear in packs with other deep elves in the Elven Halls, the Vaults and some baileys.

Spell set I
Slot1 Bolt of Cold (3d17) Wizard flag
Slot2 Throw Icicle (3d17) Wizard flag
Slot3 Summon Ice Beast Wizard flag
Slot4 Blink Wizard flag
Spell set II
Slot1 Bolt of Draining (3d17) Wizard flag
Slot2 Summon Demon Wizard flag
Slot3 Summon Vermin Wizard flag
Slot4 Blink Wizard flag
Spell set III
Slot1 Bolt of Fire (3d17) Wizard flag
Slot2 Sticky Flame Range (3d5) Wizard flag
Slot3 Summon Fire Elementals Wizard flag
Slot4 Blink Wizard flag
Spell set IV
Slot1 Bolt of Magma (3d17) Wizard flag
Slot2 Stone Arrow (3d15) Wizard flag
Slot3 Summon Earth Elementals Wizard flag
Slot4 Blink Wizard flag
Spell set V
Slot1 Lightning Bolt (3d16) Wizard flag
Slot2 Blink Wizard flag
Spell set VI
Slot1 Magic Dart (3d5) Wizard flag
Slot2 Force Lance (3d13) Wizard flag
Slot3 Iskenderun's Battlesphere Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

Although far from harmless, prioritize taking out the other deep elves before attacking these.

History

  • Deep elf magi were split into deep elf pyromancers and deep elf zephyrmancers in 0.27.
  • Prior to 0.25, the Conjuration-focused spell set had Iskenderun's Mystic Blast instead of Force Lance.
  • In 0.18, Deep elf mages became stronger and gained new spell sets, including spells previously cast by deep elf conjurers and summoners.
  • Prior to 0.13, deep elf mages had spell sets identical to a wizard's, including such devastating spells as Banishment and Lehudib's Crystal Spear.
